executable.title: DWI IO Preprocess
executable.description: Read DWI images, gradients, b values, and output the formal normalized formalt in a configuration file.\n\ Examples: \n\ DWIPreprocess data.txt data_normalize.txt --oEachShell --bThreshold 15 --mask mask.nii.gz --odwi dwi_normalize.nii.gz --ograd grad_normalize.txt --ob0Image dwi_b0.nii.gz

file.name: _InputFile
file.label: DWI Configuration File
file.description: Text file that contains b values, gradient orientations, and DWI images

file.name: _OutputFile
file.label: DWI output Configuration File
file.description: Text file that contains b values, gradient orientations, and DWI images

string.name: _DWIFile
string.description: Comma separated list of iterations must have the same number of elements as learning rate

boolean.name: _IsVectorImage
boolean.description: If it is set, the DWI images are VectorImage

boolean.name: _NoNormalizeDWI
boolean.description: If set, do not normalize DWI based on b0 image

boolean.name: _OutputEachShell
boolean.description: If set, output DWI in each shell

float.name: _BThreshold
float.description: If it is set, b values whose distance is smallter the threshold will be considered in the same shell.

boolean.name: _Warn
boolean.label: Warn
boolean.description: If it is set, show waning information when reading zero values in DWI data
